project.name: D.JANC WORKSHOP Website
project.description: Polish-language auto mechanic website — Wielka Nieszawka / Toruń. Astro 5.x + Tailwind CSS + Vercel. Goal: local SEO dominance + AI search visibility.

stories.title: Project Scaffold
stories.description: Initialize Astro 4.x project with Tailwind CSS. Create directory structure with layouts/, components/, pages/, public/, scripts/ralph/. Set astro.config.mjs output='static' and site='https://djanc.pl'. Run npm run build to verify.
acceptance_criteria: npm run build completes with no errors
Directory structure includes src/layouts/, src/components/, src/pages/, public/, scripts/ralph/

stories.title: Layout Components — Header + Footer
stories.description: Build Layout.astro (with meta/schema slots, lang=pl, Open Graph, hreflang, canonical, GA4 placeholder). Build Header.astro (sticky, logo left, nav center, orange CTA button right). Build Footer.astro (3-column: NAP | service links | hours). Build CallToAction.astro (reusable orange button). All phone links must use href='tel:+48451273483'.
acceptance_criteria: Phone link href='tel:+48451273483' is present and clickable
All Polish characters (ą ę ó ś ć ń ł ź ż) render correctly
Footer shows D.JANC WORKSHOP, ul. Toruńska 25, Wielka Nieszawka, +48 451 273 483

stories.description: Build homepage with: Hero (H1 + subheadline 'Ceny znasz zanim przyjedziesz. Naprawa tylko tego, co potrzeba.' + orange CTA), Trust bar (address + phone), Services grid (6 cards linking to service pages), Why us (3 columns: transparent pricing / kosztorys przed naprawą / wszystkie marki), AI-quotable block paragraph, Google Maps iframe, CTA footer section. Add LocalBusiness + AutoRepair JSON-LD schema in <head>.
acceptance_criteria: Phone href='tel:+48451273483' appears minimum 3 times on page
LocalBusiness + AutoRepair JSON-LD schema present in <head>
Google Maps iframe loads for ul. Toruńska 25, Wielka Nieszawka
Mobile: no horizontal scroll, phone button visible above fold

stories.title: Schema Validation Pass
stories.description: Validate all JSON-LD across all 18 pages. Check: no parse errors, no missing required fields, consistent NAP data (name, telephone, address), all service pages have Service schema, /faq has FAQPage schema, homepage has LocalBusiness + AutoRepair. Fix any malformed JSON-LD. Verify postalCode is 87-165.
acceptance_criteria: No JSON-LD parse errors in any page's <head>
Homepage LocalBusiness schema has: name, telephone, address, geo, areaServed, hasOfferCatalog
All 6 service pages have Service + FAQPage schema
npm run build passes with no errors

stories.title: sitemap.xml + robots.txt
stories.description: Install Astro sitemap integration: npx astro add sitemap. Add @astrojs/sitemap to astro.config.mjs integrations. Create public/robots.txt with: User-agent: * Allow: / Sitemap: https://djanc.pl/sitemap-index.xml. Run npm run build and verify sitemap-index.xml contains all 18+ page URLs.
acceptance_criteria: sitemap includes all pages: /, /kontakt, /uslugi, all 6 service pages, /o-nas, /cennik, /faq, /blog, /opinie
/robots.txt allows all crawlers with correct sitemap URL
npm run build passes with no errors
